titleStmt.title: The taghmical art, or, The art of expounding scripture by the points, usually called accents, but are really tactical a grammatical, logical, and rhetorical instrument of interpretation in two parts ... / by Walter Cross ...
titleStmt.author: Cross, Walter, M.A.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. Budge, for the author :
and are to be sold by A. and J. Churchill ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
"A specimen of a comment on the Old Testament by the taghmical art" 24 p. at end.
